name: AgencyPico.com
tag_list: advertising, agency, advertising-agency, creative, creative-services, creative-solutions, strategy, strategy-services, strategy-solutions, development, development-services, development-solutions, production, production-services, production-solutions, soc
overview:
World’s 1st Crowdsourced Marketing Solutions Company.

AgencyPico allow clients to source for strategy services, apps development services etc all using the same contest platform.

Aims to be an Ad Agency Killer, challenge the way Ad Agency are being currently run. It is fully automated, full service, self service only. It is web-based, thus no overhead and therefore no “extra cost” chargeable to clients

PicoActivate allows the client to use the JobBoard function to source for people to manage or implement projects.

PicoInfluence is a function where the client has the opportunity to send a message to “influencer” and see if they are keen to get paid to viral their project. “Influencers” are scored based on the number of traffic they drives to their projects.

An “advanced expert” badge is given to members who consistently drive good ratings across 10 projects. They can place their badge and holler about their expertise on their blogs etc.
